title: rank game
body: Riot what the hell i pick mid primary 5 times and still give me my secondary pick and the one you gave the mid with is the fukking retards are you fukking kidding me or you just want to troll me  cause this aint fukking funny at all and what the fukk does the report system ever works

replies.body:
What is your secondary pick? The trick is to go Mid and Top. Queue time will be massive, but you'll be far more likely to land Mid lane, since Top lane is also very popular.

You should try playing other roles though. What did you play last season when mid was taken?

It's important to be somewhat competent on all roles, so you have have a better understanding of the game as a whole.

Hey, 
Seth is right, a different category board would let you get a lot more people willing to comment and help.

Hey there,

This board is for discussions regarding player behaviour, not the champ select system.

This thread would be better suited for [Miscellaneous](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) or [Gameplay & Strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy).
Well, I'd get that IGN changed fast if I were you.
